hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: We went to university together actos 15 mg tabletas I firmly believe that "Rights are Rights", whether you are, White, Black, Latino, Asian, East Indian, Blue, Green or Purple, Heterosexual,Homosexual,Lesbian, or Trans-sexual, if you are a citizen of these United States, you are entitled to "EQUAL TREATMENT UNDER THE LAW", BUT the the problem here, is that the Mormon Church, decided to back Andy Pugno and his band of crazies. I was appalled and disgusted, that this could happen, however you must realize that the Mormon Church "RULES"Utah, from most local government, on up to the U.S. Senate and House, Liberals in this state have almost NO voice. We do have a large LGBT community in S.L.C, and it is growing, and they are also quite safe here, go figure!! BUT THEN... "THE CHURCH" SNEAKS behind everyone's back and gives 8 MILLION Dollars to Andy Pugno, to Campaign for "Prop 8"!! AND THEN... Walks WITH our LGBT community in their annual "PRIDE PARADE", I have NEVER seen such hypocrites in my entire life as those in the Mormon Church!!!
